markdown.markdown:
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

estande <- read_excel("C:dados-diversos.xlsx", "estande")

estande |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants, group = exp))+
  geom_point()+
  #facet_wrap(~exp)+
  ylim(0,max(estande$nplants))+
  geom_smooth(se = F, method = "lm")

```

#Modelos mistos

```{r}
exp1 <- estande |> 
  filter(exp == 1) 
m1 <- lm(nplants ~ trat, data = exp1)
summary(m1)

exp2 <- estande |> 
  filter(exp == 2) 
m2 <- lm(nplants ~ trat, data = exp2)
summary(m2)

exp3 <- estande |> 
  filter(exp == 3) 
m3 <- lm(nplants ~ trat, data = exp3)
summary(m3)


g1 <- exp1 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_abline(intercept = 52.5, 
              slope = -0.24) +
    ylim(0, max(estande$nplants))+
 # geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F)+
  theme_bw()+
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 24,
           y = 70, label = "y = 52.5 - 0.24x")

g2 <- exp3 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  ylim(0, max(estande$nplants))+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F)+
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 24,
           y = 70, label = "y = 52.5 - 0.24x")
library(patchwork)
g1 + g2
```

# 

```{r}
library(lme4)
mix <- lmer(nplants ~ trat + (trat | exp), 
            data = estande)
summary(mix)
library(car)
Anova(mix)
```
